title: rAja rAjEshvari
sahitya:
rAja rAjEshvari shrI rAja rAjEshvari sarva mangaLa shrI 
rAja rAjEshvari AnandadAyini padAmbujam sharaNam sharaNam


anupallavi

  shIr perum tiru nanganallUril sheidavamAi vanda dEvi mahEshvari


caraNam    mAmarai pOTriDum malai maghaLE ambA mantramE vaDivamAi vandOr shAmbhavi 
tAmdamillAmal aDiyEnaik-kAttruL dAkSAyaNi pArvati dUmrAkSa samhAriNi bhagavati
